item.title: 安联集团将以 28 亿美元出售印度合资企业 26% 的股份
item.description: 德国安联保险公司周一表示，将以约 26 亿欧元（28.4 亿美元）的价格把其在与印度 Bajaj Finserv 两家合资企业中持有的 26% 股份出售给 Bajaj 集团。【原文：The German insurer Allianz said on Monday that it was selling its 26% stake in two joint ventures with India's Bajaj Finserv to the the Bajaj Group for around 2.6 billion euros ($2.84 billion).】

item.title: DeepMind 的哈萨比斯说，英国必须在人工智能领域树立全球雄心
item.description: DeepMind 创始人德米斯-哈萨比斯（Demis Hassabis）周一表示，英国必须利用自身优势来影响全球人工智能的部署方式，这家人工智能研究公司的所有者谷歌公司也宣布升级其在英国的服务。【原文：Britain must leverage its strengths to influence how artificial intelligence is deployed around the world, DeepMind founder Demis Hassabis said on Monday, as the AI research firm's owner Google announced upgrades to its offering in the country.】

item.title: 大众汽车旗下奥迪公司将在 2029 年前裁减 7500 个行政和研发职位
item.description: 大众汽车旗下的奥迪汽车公司周一表示，到 2029 年，该公司将在德国的行政和开发等领域裁减多达 7500 个工作岗位，这是德国汽车行业最新一家削减成本的企业。【原文：Volkswagen's Audi will cut up to 7,500 jobs in Germany by 2029 in areas like administration and development, the premium carmaker said on Monday, the latest German auto industry player to reduce costs.】

item.title: 加拿大审查美国战斗机交易，但替代方案成本高昂
item.description: 与美国陷入贸易战的加拿大正在审查一份价值 190 亿加元（约合 132.9 亿美元）的合同，从洛克希德-马丁公司购买 88 架美国制造的 F-35 战斗机。【原文：Canada, locked in a trade war with the United States, is reviewing a C$19-billion ($13.29 billion) contract for 88 American-made F-35 fighter jets from Lockheed Martin but switching planes could be costly and complex, experts say.】

item.title: 美国空袭引发对船只的担忧，红海保险费率将保持坚挺
item.description: 业内人士称，美国周一对也门实施进一步空袭后，预计通过红海运输货物的成本将保持坚挺，这加剧了人们对与伊朗结盟的胡塞武装对船只发动新袭击的担忧。【原文：The cost of shipping goods through the Red Sea is expected to remain firm after the United States carried out further airstrikes on Yemen on Monday, adding to fears of new attacks on ships by the Iran-aligned Houthis targeted by Washington, industry sources said.】

item.title: 印度央行行长呼吁银行采用人工智能处理消费者投诉
item.description: 印度中央银行行长桑杰-马尔霍特拉（Sanjay Malhotra）周一表示，印度中央银行监管实体可以利用人工智能内部控制来解决消费者对不当销售和激进做法的投诉。【原文：India's central bank-regulated entities can leverage artificial intelligence internal controls to address consumer complaints on mis-selling and aggressive practices, central bank governor Sanjay Malhotra said on Monday.】

item.title: 英伟达年度大会拉开帷幕，量子计算和人工智能股票上涨
item.description: 周一，量子计算和人工智能公司股价上涨，因为投资者希望英伟达（Nvidia）将在其年度会议上发布新消息，为这些低迷的行业重新注入活力。【原文：Shares of quantum computing and artificial intelligence companies rose on Monday, as investors hoped that Nvidia would blow some life back into the beaten-down sectors with new announcements at its annual conference.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会代理主席称，该委员会可能废除拜登时代的加密资产托管提案
item.description: 华尔街最高监管机构的临时负责人周一表示，该机构正在考虑修改或废除上届政府提出的要求保管加密货币和其他资产的投资顾问达到更严格标准的法规。【原文：Wall Street's top regulator is considering changing or scrapping regulations proposed under the prior administration that would require investment advisors keeping custody of cryptocurrencies and other assets to meet stricter standards, the agency's interim chief said Monday.】

item.title: EIA 称美国天然气管道完工量提高了输送能力
item.description: 美国能源信息署周一表示，2024 年竣工的天然气管道项目使美国的液化天然气（LNG）接收能力增加了 178 亿立方英尺/日。【原文：The U.S. Energy Information Administration said on Monday that natural gas pipeline projects completed in 2024 increased the country's liquefied natural gas (LNG) takeaway capacity by 17.8 billion cubic feet per day (bcfd).】

item.title: 在《GTA VI》和 Switch 的推动下，游戏机将推动电子游戏市场增长至 2027 年
item.description: 研究公司 Newzoo 周一表示，在 2027 年之前，视频游戏机很可能成为市场最大的增长动力，理由是 Take-Two 公司即将推出的《侠盗猎车手 6》和任天堂的下一代 Switch 预计销售强劲。【原文：Videogame consoles are likely to be the biggest growth driver in the market until 2027, research firm Newzoo said on Monday, citing strong expected sales for Take-Two's upcoming "Grand Theft Auto VI" and the next-generation Switch from Nintendo.】

item.title: 消息称 ProSieben 董事会搁置 General Atlantic 交易
item.description: 消息人士周一告诉路透社，ProSiebenSat.1 监事会已经搁置了美国私募股权公司 General Atlantic 可能获得这家德国广播公司少数股权的潜在交易。【原文：The supervisory board of ProSiebenSat.1 has put on hold a potential deal that could hand U.S. private equity firm General Atlantic a minority stake in the German broadcaster, sources told Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 研究称，随着芯片行业排放量的增加，欧洲应重视可持续芯片生产
item.description: 智囊团 "界面 "周一表示，随着人工智能所需的尖端计算机芯片制造过程中产生的污染迅速增加，欧盟应重点发展现有的低排放半导体生产。【原文：With pollution linked to the manufacture of cutting-edge computer chips needed for AI rising rapidly, the European Union should focus on developing its existing lower-emission semiconductor production, think-tank interface said on Monday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，ProSieben 董事会推迟就 General Atlantic 交易做出决定
item.description: 消息人士周一告诉路透社，ProSiebenSat.1 监事会已推迟就美国私募股权公司 General Atlantic 可能获得这家德国广播公司少数股权的潜在交易做出决定。【原文：The supervisory board of ProSiebenSat.1 has delayed a decision on a potential deal that could hand U.S. private equity firm General Atlantic a minority stake in the German broadcaster, sources told Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 法国电视监管机构将 "很快 "对欧洲通信卫星公司可能违反制裁的行为做出裁决
item.description: 法国 Arcom 广播管理局告诉路透社，在一些非政府组织要求该局对欧洲通信卫星公司采取行动后，该局将很快就欧洲通信卫星公司是否遵守欧洲对俄罗斯的制裁做出裁决。【原文：France's Arcom will rule on Eutelsat's compliance with European sanctions against Russia soon, the broadcasting authority told Reuters, following requests from several NGOs that it should take action against the satellite provider.】

item.title: 塔塔集团增持塔塔游戏股份的举措获得印度监管部门批准
item.description: 印度竞争委员会（CCI）周一表示，塔塔集团（Tata Sons）从新加坡主权财富基金淡马锡控股（Temasek Holdings）关联公司手中收购塔塔游乐（Tata Play）10%额外股份的交易已获得监管部门批准。【原文：Tata Sons' acquisition of an additional 10% stake in Tata Play from an affiliate of Singaporean sovereign wealth fund Temasek Holdings has received regulatory clearance, the Competition Commission of India (CCI) said on Monday.】

item.title: 赛峰集团提出补救措施以赢得欧盟对柯林斯公司交易的批准
item.description: 欧盟委员会网站周一发布的最新消息显示，法国发动机和飞机设备制造商赛峰集团已提出补救措施，试图获得欧盟对其18亿美元收购柯林斯宇航公司飞行控制业务的反垄断批准。【原文：French engine and aircraft equipment maker Safran has offered remedies in an attempt to secure EU antitrust approval for its $1.8 billion bid for Collins Aerospace's flight controls business, an update on the European Commission website showed on Monday.】

item.title: 美国 1 月份商业库存增加
item.description: 由于销售额下降导致批发商库存增加，美国企业库存在 1 月份出现反弹，这可能会使库存在第一季度促进经济增长。【原文：U.S. business inventories rebounded in January as declining sales boosted stocks at wholesalers, which could see inventories contributing to economic growth in the first quarter.】

item.title: 美国 1 月份商业库存增加
item.description: 由于销售额下降导致批发商库存增加，美国企业库存在 1 月份出现反弹，这可能会使库存在第一季度促进经济增长。【原文：U.S. business inventories rebounded in January as declining sales boosted stocks at wholesalers, which could see inventories contributing to economic growth in the first quarter.】

item.title: 草案显示欧盟计划对欧洲废钢出口征税
item.description: 一份钢铁行动计划草案显示，欧盟委员会计划提议对欧洲废钢和金属出口实施出口限制并征收关税，以此作为支撑其濒临崩溃的产业的措施之一。【原文：The European Commission plans to propose export restrictions, duties on European scrap steel and metals exports as part of measures to shore up its ailing industry, a draft of the steel action plan showed.】

item.title: 美国 3 月住宅建筑商信心降至七个月低点
item.description: 周一的一项调查显示，由于进口材料关税提高了建筑成本，3月份美国住宅建筑商的信心降至七个月来的最低点。【原文：U.S. homebuilder sentiment dropped to a seven-month low in March as tariffs on imported materials raised construction costs, a survey showed on Monday.】

item.title: 服装零售商 Guess 收到 WHP Global 的私有化要约
item.description: Guess 周一表示，已收到品牌管理公司 WHP Global 提出的每股 13 美元的私有化要约。【原文：Guess said on Monday it had received a take-private offer from brand management firm WHP Global of $13 per share.】

item.title: 雪佛龙购买约 5%的赫斯股票
item.description: 这家石油巨头在周一提交的一份监管文件中称，雪佛龙今年购买了赫斯公司约 4.99% 的普通股。【原文：Chevron purchased about 4.99% of Hess Corp's common shares this year, the oil giant said in a regulatory filing on Monday.】

item.title: 据 Information 报道，谷歌准备与台湾联发科合作开发下一代人工智能芯片
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司正准备与台湾联发科（MediaTek）合作开发下一代人工智能芯片 "张量处理单元"（Tensor Processing Units），该芯片将于明年面世。【原文：Alphabet's Google is preparing to partner with Taiwan's MediaTek on the next version of its AI chips, Tensor Processing Units, that will be made next year, the Information reported on Monday, citing people involved in the project.】

item.title: 美国天然气价格跌至两周低点，产量创历史新高，瓦哈价格下跌
item.description: 美国天然气期货周一跌至两周低点，原因是产量创历史新高，西得克萨斯州瓦哈枢纽的现货价格下跌，而且据预测，四月初的天气将保持温和，这将使公用事业公司从储气库中提取用于家庭和企业供暖的天然气量低于往年这个时候的水平。【原文：U.S. natural gas futures eased to a two-week low on Monday on record output, negative spot prices at the Waha Hub in West Texas and forecasts for the weather to remain mild through the start of April, which should keep the amount of gas utilities pull from storage to heat homes and businesses lower than usual for this time of year.】

item.title: 据《日经新闻》报道，为应对关税，本田将采购丰田在美国生产的电池
item.description: 据《日经新闻》周一报道，日本汽车制造商本田汽车将从丰田汽车位于美国的工厂采购混合动力汽车电池，以降低特朗普政府的关税风险。【原文：Japanese automaker Honda Motor will procure batteries for its hybrid vehicles from Toyota Motor's plant in the United States in an effort to reduce tariff risks under the Trump administration, the Nikkei newspaper reported on Monday.】

item.title: VIEW 2 月零售销售增幅低于预期，1 月为负值
item.description: 美国 2 月份的零售销售额出现反弹，表明第一季度经济继续增长，但由于进口关税和联邦政府大规模裁员影响了人们的情绪，增长速度有所放缓。【原文：U.S. retail sales rebounded in February, suggesting that the economy continued to grow in the first quarter, though at a moderate pace as tariffs on imports and mass firings of federal government workers weigh on sentiment.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，KKR-Warburg Pincus 集团提交了对 Gerresheimer 的非约束性收购要约
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，包括 KKR 和华平投资在内的一个财团已提交了一份对 Gerresheimer AG 的无约束力竞标书，该公司生产用于注射减肥药（如 Wegovy）的笔。【原文：A consortium including KKR and Warburg Pincus has submitted a non-binding bid for Gerresheimer AG , which makes pens used to inject weight loss drugs like Wegovy, two people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 普京下令授权美国对冲基金购买外资持有的俄罗斯证券
item.description: 周一的一项总统令显示，俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京已允许一家美国对冲基金从某些外国利益相关者手中购买俄罗斯公司的证券，并授权其未来将这些证券出售给两家俄罗斯基金。【原文：Russian President Vladimir Putin has given a U.S. hedge fund permission to buy securities in Russian companies from certain foreign stakeholders and authorised their future sale to two Russian funds, a presidential decree showed on Monday.】

item.title: Robinhood 推出预测市场，扩大博彩业务范围
item.description: 交易平台Robinhood周一在其应用程序中推出了一个预测市场中心，允许交易者对事件结果下注，包括美联储5月份基金利率的预期上限。【原文：Trading platform Robinhood on Monday launched a prediction markets hub in its app that allows traders to bet on event outcomes, including the expected upper limit of the Federal Reserve funds rate in May.】

item.title: 百事公司将以近 20 亿美元收购 "健康汽水 "品牌 Poppi
item.description: 百事公司周一表示，将以 19.5 亿美元的价格收购益生菌苏打水品牌 Poppi，扩大 "健康苏打水 "类别的业务。【原文：PepsiCo said on Monday it would buy prebiotic soda brand Poppi for $1.95 billion, expanding in the "healthier soda" category.】
